short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays page load time in the toolbar

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
University of Surrey Starlink/Cellular chrome extension to quickly test your internet performance over Starlink and other connections without interruption.

Features:
- Get your ping, download, and upload speeds within seconds
- Measure how fast websites load
- Measure how fast famous website (Alexa top 1m) load
- Get average performance in your city/country
